pacman.agents

Class AbstractAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • pacman.agents.AbstractAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GhostAgent, PacmanAgent

    public abstract class AbstractAgent
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    This is a component that shows a character (ghost/pacman) in the game with moving animations.
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
